description: Member payment registration form. Use to initiate a scheduled payment or alter an existing schedule of payments.
name: PaySmart Member Registration

elements.name: MessageOne
elements.text: This form must be initiated by the a Gracie Barra Representative.

elements.name: Message
elements.text: This Member Registration form was not intended for you to complete. Please contact your GB School to inform them of the mistake.

events.code:

completeTableChange();

events.name: Delete Selected Member
events.code:
viewerConfig.response.splice([$('#member-table').DataTable().row('.selected').index()],1);
completeTableChange();

elements.name: Payment information description
elements.text: and subsequent instalments are to be paid each fortnight afterwards until I give notice that I wish to stop payments according to the terms and conditions including cancellation and membership freeze terms below.

pattern.message: First name should be between 1 to 50 characters long and should contain valid characters
Last name should be between 1 to 40 characters long and should contain valid characters

elements.name: Autocomplete

pattern.message: Address should be between 5 to 50 characters long
Suburb should be between 2 to 30 characters long
Postcode should be 4 character alphanumeric string
State should be alphanumeric string between 1 to 3 characters

elements.name: Phone Home
elements.label: Phone Home
elements.requiredMessage: Phone Home is required if both Phone Work and Mobile are absent

pattern.message: Phone home must be a 10 digit number beginning with zero

elements.name: Phone Work
elements.label: Phone Work
elements.requiredMessage: Phone Work is required if both Phone Home and Mobile are absent

pattern.message: Phone work must be a 10 digit number beginning with zero

elements.name: Mobile
elements.label: Mobile
elements.required: values('Phone Work') === null && values('Phone Home') === null
elements.requiredMessage: Mobile is required if both Phone Home and Phone Work are absent

pattern.message: Mobile must be a 10 digit number beginning with zero

constraints.message: DOB Must be a year greater than 1900

pattern.message: Drivers licence should be alphanumeric string between 4 to 25 characters
Email should be a valid email address
Payment should be valid number with maximum 2 decimal places
First payment should be valid number with maximum 2 decimal places
Name on card should be between 1 to 32 characters long and should contain valid characters
